text.0: Is it true that repentant Boko Haram memebers are paid 150,000 Naira monthly? Read the facts here: https://t.co/EOSVQ4GECk #DubawaChecks
text.1:

text.2: Satire is a genre of literature usually written with humour to ridicule or make fun of vices in the society. There is a need for a good understanding of what satire is, and why people should or should not take it seriously. Read here: https://t.co/BvHII0AwUJ #DubawaChecks
